body.p:
Louisville Jan 18th/61
Hon N Wolfe
Dear sir

I sent to Govenor Magoffin saturday last a petition praying the remission of a fine against Anna Langhorne a poor widow of this city will do me the favor to see the Govenor in regard to the matter -- The amount is small but large to her she fears the Workhouse give this your immediate attention and relieve her apprehension --
Sec will report to me, in this case --
